New Records: Kings snapped a six-game losing streak
Key Match Events: 11-4 run to extend lead in the fourth quarter
Key basket by Domantas Sabonis after offensive rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: Doug Christie secured his first win as interim coach
Relief for the Kings after a struggling performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mavericks were without several key players
Kings held Mavericks to 40 second-half points
